Terms and Conditions

You may not reverse engineer, decompile, or disassemble the Software, except and only to the extent that such activity is expressly permitted by applicable law notwithstanding this limitation. VelocityDB, Inc reserves all rights not expressly granted to you in this EULA. The Software is protected by copyright and other intellectual property laws and treaties. VelocityDB, Inc or its suppliers own the title, copyright, and other intellectual property rights in the Software. The Software is licensed, not sold.
Limitation of Liability
To the maximum extent permitted by applicable law and except as provided in the VelocityDB Guarantee, VelocityDB, Inc. and its suppliers shall not be liable for any damages whatsoever (including without limitation, damages for loss of business profits, business interruption, loss of business information or other pecuniary loss) arising out of the use or inability to use the Software, even if VelocityDB, Inc has been advised of the possibility of such damages. In any case VelocityDB, Inc entire liability under any provision of this Agreement shall be limited to the amount actually paid by you for the Software. These limitations do not apply to any liabilities that cannot be excluded or limited by applicable laws.
